name: Mighty the Armadillo in Sonic the Hedgehog
summary:
Mighty the Armadillo in Sonic the Hedgehog is a modification of Sonic 1 that brings the long-missing-but-recently-found member of the Chaotix to South Island for his own adventure!

Mighty realizes that Dr.Robotnik is up to no good and is capturing animals into Robots silently while Sonic is out.

Being a good friend of the blue blur and knowing Robotnik from his previous encounters he gives chase across South Island to thwart his plans!

He brings with him his wall jump ability, however not his hammer drop it's been quite some time since his Mania adventures and has to warm up on using it again.

Besides this though he does bring the spindash to the party as well!
